short.ar: في المستويات الصعبة ، عليك سحب الماء إلى الزجاج على المنصة عن طريق رسم خط.
short.am: ተፈታታኝ በሆኑ ደረጃዎች ላይ መስመር በመሳል በመድረኩ ላይ ያለውን ውኃ ወደ መስታወቱ መሳብ አለብዎት.
short.bg: В предизвикателни нива, трябва да нарисувате водата към стъклото на платформата, като нарисувате линия.
short.bn: চ্যালেঞ্জিং স্তরে, আপনাকে একটি লাইন অঙ্কন করে প্ল্যাটফর্মের গ্লাসে জল আঁকতে হবে।
short.ca: En nivells difícils, heu de dibuixar l'aigua al vidre de la plataforma dibuixant una línia.
short.cs: V náročných úrovních musíte nakreslit vodu do skla na plošině nakreslením čáry.
short.da: I udfordrende niveauer skal du trække vandet til glasset på platformen ved at tegne en linje.
short.de: In herausfordernden Levels musst du das Wasser auf das Glas auf der Plattform ziehen, indem du eine Linie zeichnest.
short.el: Σε προκλητικά επίπεδα, πρέπει να σχεδιάσετε το νερό στο ποτήρι στην πλατφόρμα σχεδιάζοντας μια γραμμή.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: In challenging levels, you have to draw the water to the glass on the platform by drawing a line.
short.es: En niveles desafiantes, tienes que dibujar el agua hacia el vidrio en la plataforma dibujando una línea.
short.et: Keerulistel tasemetel peate vee platvormi klaasile tõmbama, tõmmates joone.
short.fa: در سطوح چالش برانگیز، شما باید با کشیدن یک خط، آب را به شیشه روی سکو بکشید.
short.fi: Haastavilla tasoilla sinun on vedettävä vesi lavan lasiin piirtämällä viiva.
short.fil: Sa mahirap na mga antas, kailangan mong gumuhit ng tubig sa salamin sa platform sa pamamagitan ng pagguhit ng isang linya.
short.fr: Dans les niveaux difficiles, vous devez attirer l’eau vers le verre sur la plate-forme en traçant une ligne.
short.gu: પડકારજનક સ્તરોમાં, તમારે એક રેખા દોરીને પ્લેટફોર્મ પરના ગ્લાસમાં પાણી ખેંચવાનું હોય છે.
short.he: ברמות מאתגרות, אתה צריך לשאוב את המים לזכוכית על הרציף על ידי ציור קו.
short.hi: चुनौतीपूर्ण स्तरों में, आपको एक रेखा खींचकर मंच पर गिलास में पानी खींचना होगा।
short.hr: U izazovnim razinama morate povući vodu do stakla na platformi povlačenjem crte.
short.hu: A kihívást jelentő szinteken egy vonalhúzással kell a vizet a peronon lévő üveghez húzni.
short.id: Dalam level yang menantang, Anda harus menarik air ke kaca di platform dengan menggambar garis.
short.it: Nei livelli impegnativi, devi attirare l'acqua sul vetro sulla piattaforma disegnando una linea.
short.ja: 挑戦的なレベルでは、線を引いてプラットフォーム上のガラスに水を引く必要があります。
short.kn: ಸವಾಲಿನ ಹಂತಗಳಲ್ಲಿ, ನೀವು ಒಂದು ಗೆರೆಯನ್ನು ಎಳೆಯುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಪ್ಲಾಟ್ ಫಾರ್ಮ್ ನಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಗಾಜಿಗೆ ನೀರನ್ನು ಎಳೆಯಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 도전적인 수준에서는 선을 그려 플랫폼의 유리에 물을 그려야합니다.
short.lv: Izaicinošos līmeņos jums ir jāpievelk ūdens pie platformas stikla, novelkot līniju.
short.ml: വെല്ലുവിളി നിറഞ്ഞ തലങ്ങളിൽ, ഒരു വര വരച്ചുകൊണ്ട് പ്ലാറ്റ്ഫോമിലെ ഗ്ലാസിലേക്ക് വെള്ളം വലിച്ചെടുക്കേണ്ടതുണ്ട്.
short.mr: आव्हानात्मक स्तरांमध्ये एक रेषा आखून प्लॅटफॉर्मवरील काचेवर पाणी ओढावे लागते.
short.ms: Dalam tahap yang mencabar, anda perlu menarik air ke kaca di platform dengan melukis garis.
short.nl: In uitdagende levels moet je het water naar het glas op het platform trekken door een lijn te tekenen.
short.no: I utfordrende nivåer må du trekke vannet til glasset på plattformen ved å tegne en linje.
short.pl: Na trudnych poziomach musisz przyciągnąć wodę do szyby na platformie, rysując linię.
short.ro: În niveluri provocatoare, va trebui să atragă apa la sticla de pe platforma de desen o linie.
short.ru: В сложных уровнях вы должны притягивать воду к стеклу на платформе, рисуя линию.
short.sk: V náročných úrovniach musíte nakresliť vodu na sklo na plošine nakreslením čiary.
short.sl: V zahtevnih ravneh, morate pritegni vodo do stekla na ploščadi z vlečenjem črte.
short.sv: I utmanande nivåer måste du dra vattnet till glaset på plattformen genom att rita en linje.
short.sw: Katika viwango vya changamoto, lazima uchore maji kwenye kioo kwenye jukwaa kwa kuchora mstari.
short.ta: சவாலான நிலைகளில், நீங்கள் ஒரு கோடு வரைவதன் மூலம் மேடையில் உள்ள கண்ணாடிக்கு தண்ணீரை வரைய வேண்டும்.
short.te: ఛాలెంజింగ్ లెవల్స్ లో, మీరు ఒక లైన్ గీయడం ద్వారా ప్లాట్ ఫారం మీద గ్లాస్ కు నీటిని గీయాల్సి ఉంటుంది.
short.th: ในเลเวลที่ท้าทายคุณจะต้องวาดน้ําไปที่กระจกบนแท่นโดยการวาดเส้น
short.tr: Zorlu seviyelerde, bir çizgi çizerek suyu platform üzerindeki bardağa çekmeniz gerekir.
short.uk: На складних рівнях ви повинні залучити воду до скла на платформі, провівши лінію.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start the fun with the happy-filled glass game, which is a trendy arcade game. Pass the toughest levels and experience the adventure. Happy Filled Glass is a 2D puzzle game that combines brain training and fun. The game's excellent graphics and impressive sound effects give you a fun and thought-provoking experience. The game has dozens of different levels, each offering a new challenge and an enjoyable adventure.

The aim of the game is quite simple: Fill the water flowing from the pipe into the glass by drawing lines. It may be easy to pass the first levels, but the game will get more challenging as you progress. You must move the water into the glass using the least number of lines to pass the levels. The fewer lines you use, the more stars you earn. You can earn a maximum of three stars on each level. But be careful; using too many lines may decrease your star rating.

Happy Filled Glass is not only a fun puzzle game but also a game that allows you to improve your mental skills. As the levels progress, you must test your skills in strategizing and finding solutions. The game never gets monotonous as each level is uniquely designed.

The simple and addictive nature of the game ensures that players of all ages can enjoy it. Happy Filled Glass allows both children and adults to exercise their mental abilities in a fun way. It is an excellent opportunity to reason, use drawing abilities and develop creative thinking while solving puzzles.

Combining fun and learning, Happy Filled Glass is a game you can choose, especially when you want to spend your spare time and increase your mental activity. You will enjoy finding creative solutions and feel more successful as you complete each level.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

Happy Filled Glass Puzzle Game Features
✓ 14+ Level
✓ 2D Animation
✓ Little Particle
✓ Basic control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Happy Filled Glass Puzzle Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
